frontmatter.description: Personal values matter, especially during challenging times. Find ways to emphasize values within the given structure and confines.
frontmatter.title: Emphasize values

frontmatter.description: When change happens quickly, it's a chance to build new things. Use this chance to make things, better this time.
frontmatter.title: Make things, better

frontmatter.description: Find the good aspects that won't come back. Recognize the challenge is the only way forward.
frontmatter.title: Finding good in the challenge

frontmatter.description: Brief encounters leave a lasting impression, and negative impressions take time to correct. The correction starts with communicating the right messages. Find ways to communicate the best aspects, change perception with continued thoughtful application.
frontmatter.title: Perception frustration

frontmatter.description: If the situation gets out of control, it's often because of earlier mistakes. Play through possible scenarios mentally ahead of time, anticipate the most likely scenarios, and then repeat the process better the next time.
frontmatter.title: Anticipate likely scenarios

frontmatter.description: Present the right message, avoid introducing anxiety, and project confidence and progress towards long term goals.
frontmatter.title: Patient confidence

frontmatter.description: Good connections are hard to come by and those opportunities shouldn't be put off for the 'right' time. Make time. Encourage others.
frontmatter.title: Encourage socialization

frontmatter.description: Good structure supports many themes. Build the right structures to keep moving, building momentum, while rotating the themes.
frontmatter.title: Structure and themes

frontmatter.description: Prepare for the _next start_ and recognize there will be always be more. Be ready to start strong, rather than eking nominal returns out of the end of the previous day.
frontmatter.title: Next start momentum

frontmatter.description: Good friction makes for more memorable and unusual experiences. Digital processes work to eliminate all friction, including the good points.
frontmatter.title: Good friction
